name: Rules 更新

# 修复事件触发配置
于: 
  push:
    分支: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch: {}  # 允许手动触发
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 11 * * *'

jobs:
  build:
    runs-于: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Set up Python3
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: 3.x
    
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install pandas requests pyyaml
    
    # 新增 AdRules 处理步骤
    - name: 下载 和 process AdRules
      run: |
        mkdir -p ./clash_rules
        curl -sSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cats-Team/AdRules/main/adrules_domainset.txt" -o temp。txt
        echo "payload:" > ./clash_rules/AdRules。yaml
        grep -Ev '^(#|$)' temp。txt | sed 's/^/  - DOMAIN-SUFFIX,/' >> ./clash_rules/AdRules。yaml
        rm -f temp。txt

    - name: Run script
      run: python main。py
    
    - name: Commit 和 push 更新于 rules
      run: |
        git config --global user。email "action@github.com"
        git config --global user。name "GitHub Action"
        git add ./clash_rules/*.yaml
        
        if git diff --staged --quiet; then
          echo "No changes to commit"
          exit 0
        else
          git commit -m "Update Clash rules"
          git push
        fi
